page.title: 20Laceby Acres-pocket money
page.content: Pocket money is the amount of money you receive each week from your relations. We did a survey on the age groups 4-5,7-8,and 10-11. In the 4-5 age group the mean was 14p and the median was 10p. In the 7-8 age group the mean was 66p and the median was 80p. In the 10-11 age group the mean was 85p and the median was Â£1.50. Most people either saved their money or spent it on sweets. In the younger age groups most people saved their money and in the older age group the people either spent it on sweets or went swimming.
